pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create, Survey and Analyse Discrete Choice Experiments // This app is intended to be a complete package for creating, surveying, and analysing discrete choice experiments. Although all these functionalities are available, the app can also be used only to obtain the design of a discrete choice experiment. Reference: Perez-Troncoso, D. (2021) https://github.com/danielpereztr/DCEtool.
